awd_titl_txt: Symposium on "Physical Phenomena in Granular Materials,"    MRS Spring Meeting, San Francisco, CA, April 16-20, 1990
awd_abstract_narration: The grant provides partial funding for a Symposium on Physical                  Phenomena in Granular Materials at the Spring Meeting of the                    Materials Research Society, San Francisco, California, April 16-                20, 1990.  The funds will be used to provide partial financial                  support for participation by students.  The symposium provides a                forum for the presentation of latest results of research on the                 topic of granular materials, and consists of a format that                      encourages free discussion of the scientific issues and results.                Proceedings will be published in the Materials Research Society                 Symposium Proceedings Series, August 1990.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
